title: Anneliese Dodds – 2022 Comments on the Death of May Blood, Baroness Blood
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Anneliese Dodds, the Chair of the Labour Party, on 21 October 2022.
content:
Sad to see the passing of Baroness Blood, a political giant and tireless campaigner for women and on integration in Northern Ireland. She will be greatly missed.
